name: Balance (itch) (Trent Polack)
description: Balance is a one-button game utilizing either the space bar or the left-mouse button. Your energy is represented by the brightness of the white energy ball; the darker it is, the less energy you have. You can gain energy by absorbing energy from the pegs (but you will take damage and lose a point if you directly hit one). Keep your energy high to gain points. And seek out hearts.
